lines.text:
What in the 9 circles of hell are
you supposed to be!?!

Oh that's actually a really good
point.

Chicken McNightmare over here
just reminded me to let you know
about proper attribution.

This game is built using the
P5 library and P5.Play library.

All images and music are created
using a combination of personal
assets, public domain images, or
bought via Shutterstock.

Development software includes
Atom, Photoshop, Clip Studio,
GarageBand, Audacity, Procreate,
Text Edit, and Pyxel.

Special thanks to Pippin for
teaching Mads the code to develop
this...

And to the smartest fry eater in
the world, Stephanie Rancourt, who
designed the Math and Physics for
this game.

Madeline isn't the greatest with
number thingys so she owes a HUGE
fucking thanks to her...

WTF CAREFUL WHERE YOU POINT THAT
... THING!!!

YES! YOUR FACE!

SHE'S TALKING ABOUT YOUR FACE!
